title: Avast Antivirus 2018 Final 08/17/2318 Offline Setup
description:
Avast Antivirus 2018 Final 08/17/2318 Offline Setup

Avast Antivirus 2018 software provides complete virus protection for your computer. Antivirus engine is complemented by anti-spyware software, firewall and antispam components. And protect you from phishing programs, identity theft and viruses on the internet web dispersion.

Automatically updated to enhance the comfort and safety for users. The user has the top ratings among free antivirus software.

Avast Free Antivirus 2018 includes a tool to detect spyware. To protect you from identity theft as well as viruses.

Works on Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 / 8.1, Windows 10 (32 bit, 64 bit). 
What's New in avast Antivirus 2018 Beta 09/17/2319: 
NEW Features:

Feedback Form in Settings-> About
Possible to shred Recycle Bin via context menu (Data Shredder)
Better detection by proxy setup and update from Windows settings
Nested virtualization support for AMD CPUs
New Scan & Shield section in the UI
Changes / Fixed Bugs

Responsible for monitoring nằm Antirootkit catching unknown malware
Fixed boot issue on Windows XP Virtual PC driver is installed khi
Fixed BSOD caused by Conflict Between percsas3 and aswSP drivers DELL
Sensitive Data Shield is now thể thực scan on Windows XP and Vista
